Name: Evil Shogun
About the game: Evil ShogunÂ® is our first iOS mobile game, and now on macOS! The fictitious story is set during the Japanese Shogunate period, when the Shogun had strong power over the Emperor. A modern cyber-attack, known as man-in-the-middle attack, is incorporated into the story of the bygone era. You are a samurai hired by a wicked shogun to do all sorts of evil at his behest...... What will be your punishment in the end......? There are three different endings. Along with the far east oriental story, we have created several types of puzzles for the players to solve. Complementing all of this, is our lovingly hand crafted artwork, using traditional watercolours. If you don't like the main puzzles, you can enable 'skip' in the settings menu! We hope you enjoy the game.
